## Overview

Quarto has native support for embedding [Mermaid](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/) and [Graphviz](https://graphviz.org/) diagrams. 

```{mermaid}
%%| echo: true
flowchart LR
  A[Hard edge] -->|Link text| B(Round edge)
  B --> C{Decision}
  C -->|One| D[Result one]
  C -->|Two| E[Result two]
```

```{dot}
//| echo: true
graph G {
  layout=neato
  run -- intr;
  intr -- runbl;
  runbl -- run;
  run -- kernel;
  kernel -- zombie;
  kernel -- sleep;
  kernel -- runmem;
  sleep -- swap;
  swap -- runswap;
  runswap -- new;
  runswap -- runmem;
  new -- runmem;
  sleep -- runmem;
}
```
